mapper.sql: STWD_ID, ENACT_DGR, STWD_LNM, STWD_PNM, ENG_NM, OBJ_DESCN, DMN_YN, DMN_LNM , SYNONYMS, PROHIBITS
SDITM_ID, ENACT_DGR, SDITM_LNM, SDITM_PNM, OBJ_DESCN, DMN_ID, DMN_LNM , SAVE_TYPE, EXAM_DATA, CD_VAL_RULE, GOV_STND_CD, GOV_ORG_NM
DMN_ID, ENACT_DGR, UPP_DMNG_LNM, DMNG_LNM, DMN_LNM, DMN_PNM, OBJ_DESCN , DATA_TYPE, DATA_LEN, DATA_SCAL, SAVE_TYPE, EXAM_DATA, UNIT_TYPE, CD_VAL_RULE
mapper.insert: insert into WAA_DMNG_INFOTP_MAP (DMNG_ID, INFOTP_ID, EXP_DTM, STR_DTM, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, WRIT_DTM, WRIT_USER_ID) values (#{dmngId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{infotpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{expDtm,jdbcType=DATE}, #{strDtm,jdbcType=DATE}, #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{writDtm,jdbcType=DATE}, #{writUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into WAA_GOV_STWD
STWD_ID,
ENACT_DGR,
STWD_LNM,
STWD_PNM,
ENG_NM,
OBJ_DESCN,
DMN_YN,
DMN_LNM,

REG_USER_ID
#{stwdId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{enactDgr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{stwdLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{stwdPnm,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{engNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dmnYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dmnLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{synonyms,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{prohibits,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NOW(),
#{regUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update WAA_GOV_STWD
STWD_ID = #{stwdId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ENACT_DGR = #{enactDgr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STWD_LNM = #{stwdLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STWD_PNM = #{stwdPnm,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ENG_NM = #{engNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJ_DESCN = #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DMN_YN = #{dmnYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DMN_LNM = #{dmnLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SYNONYMS = #{synonyms,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROHIBITS = #{prohibits,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
where STWD_ID = #{stwdId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
SELECT A.STWD_ID ,A.ENACT_DGR ,A.STWD_LNM ,A.STWD_PNM ,A.ENG_NM ,A.OBJ_DESCN ,A.DMN_YN ,A.DMN_LNM ,A.SYNONYMS ,A.PROHIBITS FROM WAA_GOV_STWD A
(UPPER(A.STWD_LNM) = '%'||UPPER(#{stwdLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR})||'%' OR UPPER(A.STWD_LNM) = '%'||UPPER(#{stwdPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR})||'%')
A.OBJ_DESCN = '%'||#{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'
ORDER BY A.STWD_LNM

SELECT A.SDITM_ID, A.ENACT_DGR, A.SDITM_LNM, A.SDITM_PNM, A.OBJ_DESCN, A.DMN_ID, A.DMN_LNM, A.SAVE_TYPE, A.EXAM_DATA, A.CD_VAL_RULE, A.GOV_STND_CD, A.GOV_ORG_NM FROM WAA_GOV_SDITM A WHERE 1=1
A.SDITM_LNM = '%'||#{sditmLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'
A.OBJ_DESCN = '%'||#{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'
ORDER BY A.SDITM_LNM

SELECT A.SDITM_ID, A.ENACT_DGR, A.SDITM_LNM, A.SDITM_PNM, A.OBJ_DESCN, A.DMN_ID, A.DMN_LNM, A.SAVE_TYPE, A.EXAM_DATA, A.CD_VAL_RULE, A.GOV_STND_CD, A.GOV_ORG_NM FROM WAA_GOV_SDITM A ORDER BY A.SDITM_LNM
mapper.insert:

mapper.select:
SELECT A.DMN_ID , A.ENACT_DGR , A.UPP_DMNG_LNM , A.DMNG_LNM , A.DMN_LNM , A.OBJ_DESCN , A.DATA_TYPE , A.DATA_LEN , A.DATA_SCAL , A.SAVE_TYPE , A.EXAM_DATA , A.UNIT_TYPE , A.CD_VAL_RULE FROM WAA_GOV_DMN A
WHERE A.DMN_LNM = '%'||#{dmnLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'
ORDER BY A.DMN_LNM

SELECT A.DMN_ID , A.ENACT_DGR , A.UPP_DMNG_LNM , A.DMNG_LNM , A.DMN_LNM , A.OBJ_DESCN , A.DATA_TYPE , A.DATA_LEN , A.DATA_SCAL , A.SAVE_TYPE , A.EXAM_DATA , A.UNIT_TYPE , A.CD_VAL_RULE FROM WAA_GOV_DMN A ORDER BY A.DMN_LNM

SELECT A.DMN_ID , A.ENACT_DGR , A.UPP_DMNG_LNM , A.DMNG_LNM , A.DMN_LNM , A.OBJ_DESCN , A.DATA_TYPE , A.DATA_LEN , A.DATA_SCAL , A.SAVE_TYPE , A.EXAM_DATA , A.UNIT_TYPE , A.CD_VAL_RULE FROM WAA_GOV_DMN A
WHERE A.DMN_LNM = '%'||#{dmnLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'
mapper.update:
update WAA_GOV_DMN
DMN_ID = #{dmnId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ENACT_DGR = #{enactDgr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPP_DMNG_LNM = #{uppDmngLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DMNG_LNM = #{dmngLnm,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DMN_LNM = #{dmnLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DMN_PNM = #{dmnPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJ_DESCN = #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DATA_TYPE = #{dataType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DATA_LEN = #{dataLen,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DATA_SCAL = #{dataScal,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SAVE_TYPE = #{saveType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UNIT_TYPE = #{unitType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXAM_DATA = #{examData,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CD_VAL_RULE = #{cdValRule,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
where DMN_ID = #{dmnId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

mapper.select:
SELECT A.CD_VAL_ID, A.CD_VAL, A.CD_VAL_NM, A.DMN_ID, A.DMN_LNM, A.UPP_CD_VAL_ID, A.OBJ_DESCN, A.REG_TYP_CD, A.DISP_ORD, A.USE_YN FROM WAA_GOV_CD_VAL A
WHERE A.CD_VAL_NM = '%'||#{cdValNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'
ORDER BY A.CD_VAL_NM
SELECT A.CD_VAL_ID, A.CD_VAL, A.CD_VAL_NM, A.DMN_ID, A.DMN_LNM, A.UPP_CD_VAL_ID, A.OBJ_DESCN, A.REG_TYP_CD, A.DISP_ORD, A.USE_YN FROM WAA_GOV_CD_VAL A ORDER BY A.CD_VAL_NM

SELECT A.CD_VAL_ID, A.CD_VAL, A.CD_VAL_NM, A.DMN_ID, A.DMN_LNM, A.UPP_CD_VAL_ID, A.OBJ_DESCN, A.REG_TYP_CD, A.DISP_ORD, A.USE_YN FROM WAA_GOV_CD_VAL A
WHERE A.CD_VAL_NM = '%'||#{cdValNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'
mapper.update:
update WAA_GOV_CD_VAL
CD_VAL_ID = #{dmnId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CD_VAL = #{enactDgr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DMN_ID = #{dmngLnm,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DMN_LNM = #{dmnLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPP_CD_VAL_ID = #{dmnPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJ_DESCN = #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REG_TYP_CD = #{dataType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REG_DTM = #{regDtm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REG_USER_ID = #{regUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DISP_ORD = #{dispOrd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USE_YN = #{useYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where CD_VAL_NM = #{cdValNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
